# init(tracking:)

**Initializer**

Creates a configuration with a set of anchor capabilities.

## Declaration

```swift
init(tracking capabilities: Set<SpatialTrackingSession.Configuration.AnchorCapability>)
```

## Parameters

- **capabilities**: The set of anchor capabilities to run with a [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/SpatialTrackingSession].
title: init(tracking:)
